servinfo.title: Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment

s1.ptxt: Inspect belt for cracks, cuts, deformation, wear and cleanliness. If it is necessary to replace belt, refer to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation .
Check belt for tension. Belt is in proper tension when it deflects the following specification under thumb pressure (about 10 kg or 22 lb.).

spec-sdm.sdm-title: Water pump / generator drive belt tension

sdm1.sdm-value: 11.0 – 12.0 mm (0.43 – 0.47 in.) as deflection / 10 kg (22 lbs)
sdm1.sdm-ptxt: between Water pump pulley and Generator pulley
between Water pump pulley and Generator pulley

s1.ptxt: If belt is too tight or too loose, adjust it to proper tension as follows.

s2.ptxt: Loosen adjusting bolt (2) and remove tension pulley bolt (1). And then turn tension pulley (3) using hexagon wrench (4) as shown.
Adjust belt tension to specification, and then tighten adjusting bolt (2) and tension pulley bolt (1) to specified torque.
